mapper.select: SELECT RUN_ID, DEF_ID, PROCESS_NAME, SUBJECT, CREATOR_ID, CREATOR, CREATE_TIME, BUS_DESCP, STATUS, ACT_INST_ID, ACT_DEF_ID, BUSINESS_KEY, BUSINESS_URL, END_TIME, DURATION, PK_NAME, TABLE_NAME, PARENT_ID, START_ORG_ID, START_ORG_NAME, FORM_DEF_ID, TYPE_ID, FLOW_KEY, FORM_KEY_URL, LAST_SUBMIT_DURATION, IS_FORMAL FROM BPM_PRO_RUN WHERE RUN_ID=#{id}

SELECT RUN_ID, DEF_ID, PROCESS_NAME, SUBJECT, CREATOR_ID, CREATOR, CREATE_TIME, BUS_DESCP, STATUS, ACT_INST_ID, ACT_DEF_ID, BUSINESS_KEY, BUSINESS_URL, END_TIME, DURATION, PK_NAME, TABLE_NAME, PARENT_ID, START_ORG_ID, START_ORG_NAME, FORM_DEF_ID, TYPE_ID, FLOW_KEY, FORM_KEY_URL, LAST_SUBMIT_DURATION, IS_FORMAL FROM BPM_PRO_RUN WHERE ACT_INST_ID=#{actInstId}

SELECT RUN_ID, DEF_ID, PROCESS_NAME, SUBJECT, CREATOR_ID, CREATOR, CREATE_TIME, BUS_DESCP, STATUS, ACT_INST_ID, ACT_DEF_ID, BUSINESS_KEY, BUSINESS_URL, END_TIME, DURATION, PK_NAME, TABLE_NAME, PARENT_ID, START_ORG_ID, START_ORG_NAME, FORM_DEF_ID, TYPE_ID, FLOW_KEY, FORM_KEY_URL, LAST_SUBMIT_DURATION, IS_FORMAL FROM BPM_PRO_RUN WHERE ACT_DEF_ID=#{actDefId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BPM_PRO_RUN( RUN_ID, DEF_ID, PROCESS_NAME, SUBJECT, CREATOR_ID, CREATOR, CREATE_TIME, BUS_DESCP, STATUS, ACT_INST_ID, ACT_DEF_ID, BUSINESS_KEY, BUSINESS_URL, END_TIME, DURATION, PK_NAME, TABLE_NAME, PARENT_ID, START_ORG_ID, START_ORG_NAME, FORM_DEF_ID, TYPE_ID, FLOW_KEY, FORM_KEY_URL, LAST_SUBMIT_DURATION, IS_FORMAL ) values( #{runId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{defId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{processName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{subject,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creatorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{busDescp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{actInstId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{actDefId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{businessKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{businessUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{duration,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{pkName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tableName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{parentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{startOrgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{startOrgName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{formDefId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{typeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{flowKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{formKeyUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lastSubmitDuration,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{isFormal,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.update: UPDATE BPM_PRO_RUN SET DEF_ID=#{defId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PROCESS_NAME=#{processName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SUBJECT=#{subject,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATOR_ID=#{creatorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATOR=#{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_TIME=#{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, BUS_DESCP=#{busDescp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATUS=#{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ACT_INST_ID=#{actInstId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ACT_DEF_ID=#{actDefId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BUSINESS_KEY=#{businessKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BUSINESS_URL=#{businessUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, END_TIME=#{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, DURATION=#{duration,jdbcType=INTEGER}, PK_NAME=#{pkName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TABLE_NAME=#{tableName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PARENT_ID=#{parentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, START_ORG_ID=#{startOrgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, START_ORG_NAME=#{startOrgName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FORM_DEF_ID=#{formDefId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TYPE_ID=#{typeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FLOW_KEY=#{flowKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FORM_KEY_URL=#{formKeyUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LAST_SUBMIT_DURATION=#{lastSubmitDuration,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, IS_FORMAL=#{isFormal,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where RUN_ID=#{runId}
mapper.select:
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM BPM_PRO_RUN WHERE 1=1
AND RUN_ID != #{runId}

SELECT DISTINCT RUN.* FROM BPM_PRO_RUN RUN JOIN ACT_HI_ACTINST TK ON RUN.ACT_INST_ID = TK.PROC_INST_ID_ LEFT JOIN BPM_DEFINITION DEF ON RUN.DEF_ID = DEF.DEF_ID WHERE TK.ASSIGNEE_ = #{assignee} AND TK.END_TIME_ IS NOT NULL AND DEF.STATUS != 3 AND RUN.STATUS IN (1, 5, 6) AND UPPER(RUN.SUBJECT) LIKE '%'||#{subject}||'%' AND RUN.CREATOR LIKE '%'||#{creator}||'%' AND RUN.CREATE_TIME >=#{startTime,jdbcType=DATE} AND RUN.CREATE_TIME <= #{endTime,jdbcType=DATE} AND RUN.STATUS = #{status} AND UPPER(RUN.PROCESS_NAME) LIKE '%'||#{processName}||'%' ORDER BY RUN.CREATE_TIME DESC

SELECT DISTINCT RUN.* FROM BPM_PRO_RUN RUN JOIN ACT_HI_ACTINST TK ON RUN.ACT_INST_ID = TK.PROC_INST_ID_ LEFT JOIN BPM_DEFINITION DEF ON RUN.DEF_ID = DEF.DEF_ID WHERE TK.ASSIGNEE_ = #{assignee} AND TK.END_TIME_ IS NOT NULL AND DEF.STATUS != 3 AND RUN.STATUS IN (2,3) AND UPPER(RUN.SUBJECT) LIKE '%'||#{subject}||'%' AND RUN.CREATOR LIKE '%'||#{creator}||'%' AND RUN.CREATE_TIME >=#{startTime,jdbcType=DATE} AND RUN.CREATE_TIME <= #{endTime,jdbcType=DATE} AND RUN.STATUS = #{status} AND UPPER(RUN.PROCESS_NAME) LIKE '%'||#{processName}||'%' ORDER BY RUN.END_TIME DESC

SELECT DISTINCT RUN.* FROM BPM_PRO_RUN RUN LEFT JOIN BPM_DEFINITION DEF ON RUN.DEF_ID = DEF.DEF_ID WHERE RUN.CREATOR_ID = #{creatorId} AND RUN.STATUS = 4 AND DEF.STATUS != 3 AND UPPER(RUN.SUBJECT) LIKE '%'||UPPER(#{subject})||'%' AND RUN.CREATE_TIME >=#{startTime,jdbcType=DATE} AND RUN.CREATE_TIME <= #{endTime,jdbcType=DATE} AND UPPER(RUN.PROCESS_NAME) LIKE '%'||UPPER(#{processName})||'%' ORDER BY RUN.CREATE_TIME DESC
